div.p: To convert the alarm signals sent from the system to IEC 61850 a HU250 communication gateway is used. The HU250 gateway converts the Modbus TCP/IP signal sent from the network management card (NMC).
The NMC card is required for using the HU250 communication gateway. The connection between the NMC and the HU250 uses a straight Ethernet cable (RJ45 connection).
A connection can then be made to the HU250 gateway with a straight Ethernet cable (RJ45 connection) to access the IEC 61850 signals.
To convert the alarm signals sent from the system to IEC 61850 a HU250 communication gateway is used. The HU250 gateway converts the Modbus TCP/IP signal sent from the controller via the display.
The connection between the display and the HU250 uses a straight Ethernet cable (RJ45 connection).
A connection can then be made to the HU250 gateway with a straight Ethernet cable (RJ45 connection) to access the IEC 61850 signals.
